channel.title: Model help
channel.description:
[size=15pt]ok well recently i made an Orc Blade.. i got models to work but one thing...[/size] [IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u315/kingkong_042/model.png[/img]
[size=17pt]the inv/drop model is fine but wield model is messed up.. i think i need new ints, any suggestions?[/size]

item.title: Model help
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

still dosnt work, i may have to re-create model and gzip it again and add it…

again…

lol

item.title: Model help
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = ####; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 25; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = ####;//Weapon Id class8.anInt200 = ####;//Weapon Id class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Item Name"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Item Examine".getBytes(); }

Try that maybe?

item.title: Model help

item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Well did you give the file a animation when you made the dat file in the DatMaker? And if not try re-doing your int for it.
